data.title: [Solved] Educationist and their special educational contribution
data.meta_description: An educationist is someone who works within an educational system in various roles and responsibilities that facilitate teaching, learning,
data.text:
An educationist is someone who works within an educational system in various roles and responsibilities that facilitate teaching, learning, assessment, research, curriculum development, and policy among others.

The following are the Educationist and their special educational contribution:

Therefore, option 3 is the correct answer.

-> MH SET 2024 Result has been released!

-> This is for the exam which was conducted on 7th April 2024.

-> Candidates having a master's degree from a UGC-recognized university are eligible to apply for the exam.

-> The candidates are selected based on the marks acquired in the written examination, comprising two papers.

-> The serious aspirant can go through the MH SET Eligibility Criteria in detail. Candidates must practice questions from the MH SET previous year papers and MH SET mock tests.
